line.text: Not marble nor the gilded monuments
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of princes shall outlive this powerful rhyme
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But you shall shine more bright in these contents
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than unswept stone besmeared with sluttish time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When wasteful war shall statues overturn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And broils root out the work of masonry
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor Mars his sword nor war quick fire shall burn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The living record of your memory
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall you pace forth your praise shall still find room
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Even in the eyes of all posterity
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That wear this world out to the ending doom
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So till the judgment that your self arise
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: You live in this and dwell in lovers eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
